name: Sleeplist
description:
We are excited to share with you our first horror game: Sleeplist

We had a blast (and very little sleep) during this jam, and we hope at least a few of you will sleep with your lights on after playing this game!

NB! Missing video file for ending cinematic, watch it here -->

Keybinds:
Movement - AWSD 

Flashlight - LMB 

Checklist - J 

Interact - F

Quit Game - Alt + F4 :))

Sloyd assets used (32):

Chair, Desk, Coat hanger, Window, List, Office chair, Shower, Soap dispenser, Sofa, Table, Sci-fi container, Sci-fi Tower, Sci-fi Console, Binders, Bookshelf, Clock, Cup, Ceiling Fan, Bed, Kitchen Counter/Drawer/Sink, Lamp, Nightstand, Potion, Radiator, Radio, Screen, Stove, Humanoid, Lightsaber, Crank


Programs used:
Unreal Engine 5.1.1, Maya, Blender, Substance Painter, Photoshop Premiere Pro, Sloyd AI App

Made by Peter Doerstel, Ingar Gravåsen, Johan Lefdal
